metadata.title: FTL: MULTIVERSE - FORGOTTEN RACES - DIAMOND ADDON
metadata.author: Gabriel Cooper
metadata.description:
PATCH AFTER MULTIVERSE, REQUIRES INFERNO CORE 1.2+, FORGOTTEN RACES AND THE RENEGADE COLLECTION, PATCH BOTH OF THOSE BEFORE FR
This mod is basically all the golden, copper and adamantine content that used to be part of forgotten races but simply didn't fit the goal of the mod, so now it's here.
Works with Multiverse 5.4.X
